extendedInfo.description: Get access to over 15 million songs, and listen to them on the go. Jam-pack your Android with all the tracks it can handle and hear your music even when youâre offline. MOG has practically all your favorite albums, and suggests music tailored to your tastes. Get more music than you can hear in your lifetime.MOG subscribers get the most powerful and easy-to-use music service on the planet, with:â Unlimited downloads for offline playback on your Android. *â Access to over 15 million songs â find your favorites with blazingly fast searches and discover millions more.â Amazingly accurate music suggestions Just For You.â Radio perfection: Truly personalised, with simple and fun ways to discover new music, like customizable artist-only radio, exclusive to MOG. â Instant sync between web and mobile.â Lots of ways to listen that fit your life at home, at work, and on the go.**â Playlists created by your favorite artists, and tons more!Love music? All you need is MOG. Take it from the experts:TIME.comTop Music App of 2011 FORBESLike Spotify? MOG is even betterTRY IT FREE â SEE MOG.COM FOR DETAILS. Charges apply after free trial ends unless you unsubscribe. *** One free trial per customer. MOG is currently only available in the US and Australia.See you in music paradise....* With a paid mobile subscription, after your initial stream and storage, you can play your stored tracks everywhere you go.** MOG is on Sonos, Squeezebox, and many more devices.*** Australian users: Data charges may apply for non-BigPond and non-Telstra customers.Android is a registered trade mark of Google Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

reviews.comment: I love MOG I have tried the others and always come back home to MOG. Without a doubt MOG is the best I\'m back for good. Enjoy MOG with me!
reviews.author: Jimmy Marsalis

reviews.title: Great sound quality, features are adequate
reviews.comment: The sound quality of Mog cannot be beat. I subscribed to ALL of the services available, including Google\'s new streaming service, and compared them all. Sure it\'s easy enough to look up what bitrate each service uses, but I wanted to see if I could actually hear a difference, and I could. Mog wins.   However, now that I\'ve tried all the various services, I find myself wishing that Mog\'s radio function was as clever as Pandora, that they had a desktop app like Rhapsody, and landscape in the mobile app.
reviews.author: Stuart Brewer

reviews.title: Great idea, needs some changes
reviews.comment: Love the concept and it is fast with a decent selection of songs.    Need improvements on building playlist and downloading songs to droid or ipad.  Also can\'t get shuffle button to work on droid.
reviews.author: Paull Boger

reviews.title: Great sound but....
reviews.comment: If only the option to create play list in the downloaded music section on mobile phones I would give five stars
reviews.author: Adrian Villasenor

reviews.title: Great Selection
reviews.comment: I\'ve used every subscription music service out there. The navigation seems more complicated than the others.  However,  the sound quality rocks!  **As of late the software has been extremely glitchy** Sound quality is still great,  but half of the time playback is inconsistent and the queue just skips around like crazy.   Please fix.
reviews.author: Samuel Cuevas

reviews.title: I love the rock band KISS !
reviews.comment: This is the best one yet ! Very few play the whole album. Others are very limited until you buy the UPGRADE, but not MOG. BEST SOUND EVER with my \" beats by Dr.dre \" ear buds !!! Lov it
reviews.author: Jody Davila

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Has all the new hit songs and albums . And the display is great I would like a cute interactive widget though . That would be great.
reviews.author: Milika Sims

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very good music service and their customer support is great as well, very satisfied with MOG, great job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The APP I\'ve been looking for
reviews.comment: If they had\'t offered a free 7-day trial, I would have most likely never tried it. Thank the lord they do! Because it\'s THE app. You can have stations that focus on only one artist! You can also choose they song you want to listen to, instead of that station! Along with varied listening modes, like a \"discovery\" mode. The app could use a tweaks here and there, to make it more atteactive and simple, but i\'ll have to settle with the current one because what they offer is perfect.
reviews.author: Leobardo Daniel Oropeza

reviews.title: Like, but
reviews.comment: My money is stretched w/ 2 adults & 3 teens.  Wish I could buy.  Love the way, it gets EVERY song right for me. Its a great app & would (i do) recommend to anyone that likes listening to music \342\200\246
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great service, app needs work
reviews.comment: I love MOG, great track selection and audio quality.. Would be 5 stars if you could rearrange the play queue
reviews.author: Phillip Halden

reviews.title: Great App, Unlimited Supply of Music
reviews.comment: Unbelievable storehouse of music. Never expected access to obscure music, popular music, etc. Name it! MOG has it. I\'m pretty new, so I\'m still learning, wondering how to shut off the shuffle feature. I prefer my sequencing of music over random mixing. Otherwise O.K.
reviews.author: Wendell Bivens

reviews.title: Great overall..
reviews.comment: I love this app, but I sure do wish that everyone I download an album with featured tracks from other artists it didn\'t add them to an individual artists file.
reviews.author: James Van Dyke

reviews.title: Album playback issues
reviews.comment: Very annoying can\'t play entire albums usually from app.  Issue with play queue? Droid bionic.  otherwise 5stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: By far the best music site. I love it, I would give it 5 stars if it didnt crash and stop but It dont do it much at all. But other then that,, I love it
reviews.author: antoine norville

reviews.title: MOGG MUSIC APP
reviews.comment: \"The FREAKING BEST..APP. I\'VE EVER DOWNLOADED FROM THE ok PLAYSTORE,2 YEARS SEARCHING FOR..\"THIS ONE..IS THE SHIZZNITT, FOUND EVERTHIN I BEEN LOOK/B4..100 STAR RATING ,\"THAT\'S ME THO!\"GREAT HELP, THANX
reviews.author: Tanya Maywell

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love Mog, they have any song I can think of, the sound quality is fantastic, and its easy to use.
reviews.author: Amy Snyder

reviews.comment: this is one of the best app it will be better if is free 100% l will donate if u put it like for now l think is good no problem hope still like this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best value on telstra ever.
reviews.comment: Top quality tracks and bitrates. Plus Being able to use this app from prepaid credit. Sweeeeeeet.
reviews.author: Shannon Shelton

reviews.title: Seems nice
reviews.comment: Its a nice program, has a lot of nice options and gives you other songs you may like. It is just that I will have to think and wait to see if I want to go to the full version.
reviews.author: Kevin Davison
